pageTitle: Duke Opens ACC Slate Against No. 1 Virginia - Duke University Blue Devils | Official Athletics Site - GoDuke.com
textBeforeTable: Duke vs. Virginia -- Last Three Series   • Friday’s game marks the 158th meeting in program history between Duke and Virginia ... The Cavaliers lead the series 100-56-1, including a streak of five straight victories ... The two teams first met in 1906 as Duke won the inaugural meeting, 4-2 ... The Blue Devils are in search of their first series win over the Cavaliers since the 2008 campaign. Virginia Series History Aaron Cohn laced a two-out, two-run double in the bottom of the eighth to send Wednesday’s game against Liberty to extra innings, but the Flames put six runs on the board to secure an 8-2 victory. James Marvel ... Redshirt junior Andrew Istler and a seven-inning, three-hit performance by sophomore Trent Swart, a one-run, five-strikeout outing from junior • Duke posted a 2-1 record at the Caravelle Resort Tournament in Myrtle Beach, S.C., before falling in 11 innings Wednesday against Liberty ... The Blue Devils lost to West Virginia (1-3) in their first game of the Caravelle Resort Tournament before picking up wins over Marshall (5-2)  Saturday and Coastal Carolina (7-5) Sunday ... Duke’s starting pitching posted strong performances on the weekend, including a one-run showing from junior Last Time Out   Duke RHP
textAfterTable: 4/15/11   Charlottesville, Va. L 0-10   Last Time We Met •  Then-No. 7 Virginia swept Duke in a three-game series May 10-12, 2013 in Charlottesville, Va. ... Trailing 5-3 heading to the bottom of the ninth, UVa rallied for three runs to earn the 6-5 victory Friday, May 10 ... The Cavaliers registered a season-high 22 hits Saturday, May 11 en route to a 17-8 victory ... Duke led 3-0 Sunday, May 12 but Virginia was able to put the finale away with a five-run seventh, taking the game 14-6.   Current Blue Devils vs. Virginia Duke Hitters vs. Virginia Name AVG GP-GS  AB R H RBI Reed Anthes  .429 3-2 7 1 3 1  Matt Berezo  .250 4-1  4  0   1  0 Jordan Betts   .278  9-9  36  6  10  3
